cal_data_missing: To send data you must fill in all fields
notif_ZeroImpactDayClass: WELL DONE! Today you all came to school on foot or by bike: it's a day with ZERO IMPACT and you won {{_bonus_}} Km!
notif_NoCarDayClass: CONGRATULATIONS! Today none of you used your car to come to school and you won {{_bonus_}} Km!
notif_AlmostReachedLeg: You have almost reached the stage {{_leg_}}. Keep it up!
notif_WeeklyRecordClass: CONGRATULATIONS! You have beaten your weekly record by {{_record_}} Km!
notif_WeeklyPerformanceSchool: Last week the school covered a total of {{_performance_}} Km. Keep it up!
notif_ChallengeWon: CONGRATULATIONS! You have overcome the challenge that was assigned to you and you have earned {{_VirtualPrize_}}!
notif_GameFinished: CONGRATULATIONS: YOU HAVE ARRIVED IN KANGOLE! You have traveled {{_totalKm_}} sustainable Km
notif_badge: WELL DONE! You have reached the stage {{badge}}!
notif_empty: There are not any notifications yet
challenge_ScuolaSenzAuto: School Challenge: Take a "Car-Free Day" to win {{VirtualPrize}}
challenge_KmSettimanali: Challenge of {{TargetTeam}}: Travel at least {{target}} Km this week to win {{VirtualPrize}}
challenge_ViaggiGiornalieri: School Challenge: make at least {{_target_numTrips_}} journeys on foot, by bike or by bus in one day to win {{VirtualPrize}}
